entry.def: To regenerate something means to develop and improve it to make it more active, successful, or important, especially after a period when it has been getting worse.

example.ex: The government will continue to try to regenerate inner city areas.
example.tran: 政府将继续努力重建内城地区。

entry.tran: (使）(器官或肌体组织）再生；(使）再造
entry.def: If organs or tissues regenerate or if something regenerates them, they heal and grow again after they have been damaged.

example.ex: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed...
example.tran: 如果受到损伤，神经细胞再造的能力有限。
